title: What to Expect from the ESPR Working Plan 2025–2030?
subtitle: 22 product groups. One regulation. A timeline every business needs to know.
featuredImageAlt: ESPR Working Plan 2025–2030 — product groups and Digital Product Passport timeline
excerpt: The ESPR Working Plan 2025–2030 sets the order and tempo for ecodesign requirements across 22 product groups, each requiring a Digital Product Passport. Here’s what to expect and when.
